name: Hive Token
public_notice: According to GoPlus, the contract creator can make changes to the token contract such as disabling sells, changing fees, minting, transferring tokens etc. Exercise caution.
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
Hive Token is a decentralized digital asset built on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) that emphasizes transparency, honesty, and community-first values. Its design focuses on long-term sustainability through a deflationary token model with built-in burn mechanisms, while also supporting liquidity growth and ecosystem utility.

The project aims to create a fair and trustworthy DeFi environment by:

Implementing a 3% buy and sell tax where 1% is automatically burned, reducing supply over time, and 2% is reserved in the contract for future liquidity and development.

Maintaining clear, trackable transactions on-chain to ensure transparency for all participants.

Providing additional utility through staking options, on-chain games, and community-driven initiatives that increase engagement and expand token use cases.

Hive Token’s mission is to deliver a token that is simple to understand, straightforward to use, and aligned with building long-term value for its holders.
